findings.title: Research effective LLM prompting for documentation

deviations.description: Research task marked complete but no formal research document created

findings.ai_consensus: Research patterns are clearly evident in all three generator implementations with proper separation of research (LLM) from composition (Python) phases

findings.title: [Verification Task - Pending]

deviations.description: Task blocked by file location structural issue
deviations.justification: Specification verification cannot complete until generator files are relocated to development source location

findings.ai_consensus: This task appears to be a verification step that validates all phase-3 files are in the correct location and properly integrated.

structural_issues.description: All generator implementations are located in installed package structure (src/claude_skills/claude_skills/llm_doc_gen/generators/) rather than development source location (skills/llm-doc-gen/generators/)
structural_issues.impact: Blocks phase-3 completion and prevents proper development workflow
remediation: Copy all generator files from src/claude_skills/claude_skills/llm_doc_gen/generators/ to skills/llm-doc-gen/generators/
Update test imports to reference correct development location

strengths: Clear separation of concerns (prompt formatting, LLM consultation, composition)
Consistent design patterns across all generators
Token budget awareness in prompt design

test_coverage.details: Test suites exist for all three generators plus e2e tests. Tests cover monolith, monorepo, and multi-part project scenarios.

recommendations.description: Relocate all generator files from src/claude_skills/ to skills/llm-doc-gen/generators/
recommendations.rationale: File location mismatch blocks phase completion and prevents proper development workflow

recommendations.description: Add formal journal entry documenting research findings from task-3-1
recommendations.rationale: Formalize research phase completion with documented insights about token budget management and BMAD patterns

recommendations.description: Run full test suite after file relocation to verify imports and functionality
recommendations.rationale: Ensure all tests pass with correct development file structure

summary_text: Phase-3 has excellent implementation quality with all five generator files fully realized and properly tested. The functional requirements are met with high code quality. However, a critical structural issue blocks phase completion: all generators are located in the installed package directory (src/claude_skills/) rather than the development source directory (skills/llm-doc-gen/). This mismatch prevents the pending verification task (task-3-6) from completing. Resolving this file location issue (estimated 45 minutes) will allow phase-3 to reach 100% completion and unblock Phase-4.
